funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.utilities

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.utilities.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents Matrices. The matrix:
    a11 a12 a13 a14
    a21 a22 a23 a24
    a31 a32 a33 a34
    a41 a42 a43 a44

    is stored column major in a single array, as follows:

    a11 a21 a31 a41 a12 a22 a32 a42 a13 a23 a33 a43 a14 a24 a34 a44

      • solve

        public Matrix solve(Matrix B)
        Solve X = A\B assuming A is square and has full rank
        Parameters:
        B - a Matrix with the same number of rows as this Matrix
        Returns:
        a Matrix X that has the same number of rows as this Matrix and the same number of columns as B

      • solve

        public double[] solve(double[] b)
        Solve x = A\b assuming A is square and has full rank
        Parameters:
        b - a vector with length equal to the number of rows in this Matrix
        Returns:
        a vector x with length equal to the number of columns in this Matrix
